amendment.description: Amendment delays the implementation date for a plan to reduce the number of Corps of Engineers division offices from May 1 to August 15 of 1996, and strikes a provision barring the use of funds to operate the dredge vessel McFarland for purposes other than emergency dredging.
amendment.purpose: An amendment made in order pursuant to H. Res. 171 that delays the effective date of a plan to reduce the number of Army Corps of Engineers division offices from May 1, 1996 to August 15, 1996; and strikes a provision barring the use of funds to operate the dredge vessel McFarland for purposes other than emergency dredging.

action.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
